name: Wild Lion Survival Simulator
description:
Welcome to the best lion simulator of 2020. Discover beautiful mountains, lakes and forests in endless savanna! Train your lion, upgrade your skills and battle against many more animals, climb trees, find your mate & raise a family!
You can do whatever you want in magical world of forest and savanna!


Stunning Hd Graphics
Realistic lion animations
Open World Simulation& RPG Experience

REALISTIC SURVIVAL SIMULATOR:
- Fight, prey and eat animals. Be the hunter not the prey!
- Hunt On Land, Jump from a tall trees or lurk up on a stone and ambush your prey!
- Prepare for epic battles with 10 different animals.

START A FAMILY:
- Find your mate , start your herd ,Raise your cup and hunt stronger animals with your family.

REALISTIC Day/Night Cycle:
light intensity of the sun realisticly changes based on sun altitude.
Realistic stars with twinkling, moon with phases and high altitude animated cirrus clouds

Realistic Sound System:
Real life environmental sounds from african savanna!
All animals have real life sounds!

Realistic Weather:
5 Different realistic weather types with sounds: Clear Sky, Cloudy, Raining, Storm, Foggy and lightning storms.

Open World Beautiful Savanna inspired from Africa:
The majority of the savanna is covered in different types of grasses.There are also lots of trees spread around the savanna including the acacia tree and the baobab tree
Animals in the Savanna :
Because the savanna is so rich in grasses and tree life, many herbivores and predators live in large herds.
You wil hunt rabbits, zebras, deers, elephants, hippopotamuses, giraffes, wild boars, rhinoceroses and hyenas.

Enjoy ツ
